system.description:
Thread 1: When blood is drawn, maybe then we shall revel in ultraviolence.

Prereq: Shadow Ritualist

Spend 1 Beat to leap down like Sri Dapa's Scythe: Make a Melee Air Bravery Attack vs 1 fighter on an Elevation lower than yours in range 3, then Rush to a square adjacent to them.

Sri Dapa's Harvest: +1 Beat to give this attack Overwhelming.

Flitting Death: +1 Beat to increase the range to range 5.
